GR14ss6_priu:9201: kutaḥ punar yuṣmākaṃ mayy etāvān anurāgas tatrāhuḥ

GR14ss6_priu:9249: dāma- [BhP 10.35.20] ity ādi manda-vāyuḥ [BhP 10.35.21] ity-ādy-antaṃ ca tat-

GR14ss6_priu:9274: athavā, anenaivāprasiddho'pi devakī-śabdo'tra śrī-yaśodāyām eva jñeyaḥ /

GR14ss6_priu:9277: nāmnī nanda-bhāryāyā yaśodā devakīti ca iti purāṇāntara-vacanaṃ ca

GR14ss6_priu:9337: hasantyaḥ premerṣyayā kṛṣṇam upahasantya ity arthaḥ /

GR14ss6_priu:9349: atra kiṃvadantīm āśritya padmāyāḥ pratināyikātvenopanyāsaḥ kriyate / dūta-

GR14ss6_priu:9357: api ca / evam api asmad-vidha-kṛpaṇa-pakṣa-pāte saty eva tatra uttama-śloka-

GR14ss6_priu:9362: tataḥ praṇayerṣayā tasmin doṣam āropyāpi svasvyās tadīyāsakti-

GR14ss6_priu:9391: eke / tatra jñāna-yogopadeśena tāsāṃ na śāntir iti dvitīya-sandeśo yat tv ahaṃ

GR14ss6_priu:9396: gatān [BhP 10.82.42] ity ādi vakṣyamāṇānusāreṇa kāryāntarasyāpi bhavat-

GR14ss6_priu:9438: nūnaṃ bhūtāni bhagavān yunakti viyunakti ca // [BhP 10.82.42] ity ādi

GR14ss6_priu:9456: ātmānaṃ svaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇam adhikṛtya yā śikṣā tayā /

GR14ss6_priu:9494: 11.12.11] iti cātīta-prayogeṇa tadānīṃ virahasya nāstitvaṃ bodhitam /
GR14ss6_priu:9499: yaḥ saṅgas tena baddha-dhiyaḥ satyaḥ paramānandāveśena tadānīṃ kim api
GR14ss6_priu:9503: śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe kṛtam asti mat-kāmā ramaṇaṃ jāram [BhP 11.12.13] ity

GR14ss6_priu:9519: mādhavasya [7.18] dagdhaṃ hanta dadhānayā vapuḥ ity ādāv aupapatya-
GR14ss6_priu:9524: cauryaṃ saṅgānaṃ rāsaḥ jala-krīḍā vṛndāvana-vihāra ity ādayaḥ / tatra līlā-
GR14ss6_priu:9525: cauryaṃ yathā tāsāṃ vāsāṃsy upādāya nīpam āruhya satvaraḥ [BhP 10.22.9]
GR14ss6_priu:9528: saṅgānam kācit samaṃ mukundena [BhP 10.33.9] ity ādau / evaṃ
GR14ss6_priu:9534: vraja eva gānena sa-bhrātṛkasyāpi tasya strī-janair
GR14ss6_priu:9545: tatra ca vrajāntastham eva vanaṃ jñeyam /
GR14ss6_priu:9547: rāsaḥ / tatrārabhata govindo rāsakrīḍām anuvrataiḥ [BhP 10.33.2] ity ādi /
GR14ss6_priu:9548: jala-krīḍā-- so 'mbhasy alaṃ yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ [BhP 10.33.23] ity ādi /
GR14ss6_priu:9555: iyaṃ ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-candrasyojjvala-līlā rāsa-sambandhiny apy anantatvena
GR14ss6_priu:9556: sammatā-- evaṃ śaśāṅkāṃśu-virājitā niśāḥ [BhP 10.33.25] ity ādau / atha
GR14ss6_priu:9562: yan no vihāya govindaḥ prīto'yam anayad rahaḥ //
GR14ss6_priu:9564: yān brahmeśo ramā devī dadhur mūrdhny aghanuttaye //
GR14ss6_priu:9565: tasyā amūni naḥ kṣobhaṃ kurvanty uccaiḥ padāni yat /
GR14ss6_priu:9567: na lakṣyante padāny atra tasyā nūnaṃ tṛṇāṅkuraiḥ /
GR14ss6_priu:9574: keśaprasādhanaṃ tv atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam /
GR14ss6_priu:9575: tāni cūḍatayā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam // [BhP 10.30.27-34]
GR14ss6_priu:9580: na lakṣyanta iti tāḥ khedayantīnāṃ sakhīnām /
GR14ss6_priu:9588: sarvāsām evārtir uktā sāpi svasyotkaṇṭhāviśeṣeṇa sarvatra saṅgacchata eva //
GR14ss6_priu:9590: tatra tasyāḥ śrī-vṛndāvaneśvaryā līlāyāṃ prāk-pradarśitam apy eṇapatnī
GR14ss6_priu:9592: tatra vistara-śaṅkāto yā yā vyākhyā na vistṛtā /
GR14ss6_priu:9594: tad evam anena sandarbheṇa śāstra-prayojanaṃ vyākhyātam /
GR14ss6_priu:9601: tādṛśa-bhāvaṃ bhāvaṃ prathayitum iha yo'vatāram āyātaḥ /
GR14ss6_priu:9608: prītyākhyaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ sandarbhaḥ samāptim iha saṅgataḥ //
